description: Trail starts off easy with slight elevation mostly through dense forest with lose rock on well packed trail. After 2 hours scenery opens up with waterfall, followed by 3 lakes until foot of Mt Bourgeau is reached. On the way there you will encounter, loose rock, packed earth as well as light scree on the trail.Ascent to Mountain peak on rock, and slap. Last done 28th of August. We had snow and rain and snow on trail. Hiking Poles are strongly recommended.Great open vistas, rock formations and beautiful mountain lakes.On peak of Mount Bourgeau take the small ridge walk south. Great views of Nakiska nad sourroundings.
directions: Head west from Calgary on Hwy 1.After Sunshine village (2.8 km) turn left , Lake Bourgaeu turnoff. You cross Hwy. 1.On parking lot pass through Gate and follow trail Until Lake Bourgeau from there follow trail to Harvey Pass
title: Mt Bourgeau/ Harvey Pass
